meanings.definition: A person who has been selected or appointed to a particular position or role.
meanings.sent1: The designees for the student council were excited to start their new roles.
meanings.sent2: The company's designees for the leadership positions were announced at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The designees for the superhero team had to quickly learn their new powers.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the designees like a shining star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The designees were like puzzle pieces perfectly fitting into their assigned positions.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing or selecting someone for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The designees of the talent show contestants took place behind closed doors.
meanings.sent2: The designees of the best costume award were eagerly awaited by all participants.
meanings.sent3: The designees of the ice cream flavors caused quite a stir among the group.
meanings.sent4: Her designees of the perfect vacation spot led them to a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The designees of the secret mission were handed their envelopes with anticipation.
